Uses of Package
org.forgerock.openam.http.annotations

  • Packages that use org.forgerock.openam.http.annotations 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.http  
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.docs.api
    This package contains classes related to API documentation related endpoints
    org.forgerock.openam.http.annotations
    This package contains annotations that can be used to declare HTTP methods for being handled by methods on a class.
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openam.http.annotations used by org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.http 
    Class Description
    Contextual
    Mark a method parameter as provided from the http-framework context.
    Post
    Specify a POST HTTP method endpoint.
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openam.http.annotations used by org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.docs.api 
    Class Description
    Contextual
    Mark a method parameter as provided from the http-framework context.
    Get
    Specify a GET HTTP method endpoint.
  • Classes in org.forgerock.openam.http.annotations used by org.forgerock.openam.http.annotations 
    Class Description
    PayloadTranslator
    Translates from the input Reader to the type.
